name: Agile Scrum Workshop
description: An in-depth workshop on Agile and Scrum methodologies. This course covers all essential aspects of Agile Scrum including planning, execution, and review. Ideal for professionals looking to enhance their Scrum skills and knowledge in real-world applications.

options.description: Printed book edition of the Agile Scrum Workshop.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for Agile Scrum.
Self-paced online course with video lectures and quizzes.
Mock test series to evaluate your understanding of Agile Scrum.

name: Peoplecert SCRUM Master 1
description: Preparation course for the Peoplecert SCRUM Master 1 certification. This course provides a comprehensive understanding of Scrum principles and practices necessary to become a certified Scrum Master.

options.description: Printed book edition for SCRUM Master 1 certification.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for SCRUM Master 1.
Self-paced online course for SCRUM Master 1 certification.
Mock test series to prepare for SCRUM Master 1 certification.

name: Peoplecert SCRUM Master 2
description: Advanced course for the Peoplecert SCRUM Master 2 certification. This course is designed for experienced Scrum Masters who want to advance their skills and knowledge in Scrum.

options.description: Printed book edition for SCRUM Master 2 certification.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for SCRUM Master 2.
Self-paced online course for SCRUM Master 2 certification.
Mock test series to prepare for SCRUM Master 2 certification.

name: Peoplecert SCRUM PRODUCT OWNER I
description: Course designed for those seeking the Peoplecert SCRUM PRODUCT OWNER I certification. This course covers all essential aspects needed to become a certified Product Owner in Scrum.

options.description: Printed book edition for SCRUM Product Owner I certification.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for SCRUM Product Owner I.
Self-paced online course for SCRUM Product Owner I certification.
Mock test series to prepare for SCRUM Product Owner I certification.

name: Prince2 ® Foundation
description: Foundation course for the Prince2 ® certification. This course covers the basics of the Prince2 ® methodology, including principles, processes, and themes.

options.description: Printed book edition for Prince2 ® Foundation.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for Prince2 ® Foundation.
Self-paced online course for Prince2 ® Foundation.
Mock test series for Prince2 ® Foundation.

name: Prince2 ® Practitioner
description: Advanced course for the Prince2 ® Practitioner certification. This course is intended for those who have completed the Foundation level and want to further their skills in Prince2 ®.

options.description: Printed book edition for Prince2 ® Practitioner.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for Prince2 ® Practitioner.
Self-paced online course for Prince2 ® Practitioner.
Mock test series for Prince2 ® Practitioner.

name: ITIL®4 Create,Deliver and Support.
description: ITIL® 4 Create, Deliver and Support addresses the cultural and team management aspects of product and service management; provides an overview of the tools and technologies.

options.description: Printed book edition for ITIL®4 Create,Deliver and Support.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for ITIL®4 Create,Deliver and Support.

options.heading: ITIL® 4 Create, Deliver and Support - Self Learning Course
options.description: Self-paced online course for ITIL®4 Create,Deliver and Support.
ITIL® 4: CREATE, DELIVER AND SUPPORT certification exam simulator helps students prepare for the ITIL® 4: CREATE, DELIVER AND SUPPORT examination, based on the actual exam pattern..

Comprehensive ITIL® 4: Create, Deliver, and Support corporate training program designed to prepare teams for certification. Includes hands-on workshops and an exam simulator based on the actual exam pattern.

name: MSP ® 5 Foundation.
description: MSP (Managing Successful Programmes), 5th edition is designed to align programmes and projects to organizational strategy and enable enterprise agility.

options.description: Printed book edition for MSP ® 5 Foundation.
MANAGING SUCCESSFUL PROGRAMMES certification exam simulator helps students prepare for the MANAGING SUCCESSFUL PROGRAMMES, based on the actual exam pattern.
Tailored MSP® 5 Foundation corporate training program designed to align your teams with organizational strategy. Includes interactive workshops and a comprehensive exam simulator.

name: SDI – Service Desk Analyst.
description: The Service Desk Institute (SDI) ® is the leading professional organization for everyone working in the IT service and support industry.

options.description: Printed book edition for SDI – Service Desk Analyst.
Service Desk Analyst V8 certification exam simulator helps students prepare for the Service Desk Analyst V8, based on the actual exam pattern.
Live instructor-led online bootcamp for SDI – Service Desk Analyst.
Tailored MSP® 5 Foundation corporate training program designed to align your teams with organizational strategy. Includes interactive workshops and a comprehensive exam simulator.

name: MoP ® Foundation.
description: Portfolio management plays a critical role in facilitating organizational survival and growth – by better coordinating investment in programmes and projects.

options.description: Voucher for the MoP ® Foundation certification exam, providing access to the official examination.
MoP ® Foundation certification exam simulator helps students prepare for the MoP ® Foundation, based on the actual exam pattern.

Customized MoP® Foundation corporate training program to enhance portfolio management skills across your organization. Includes hands-on workshops and an exam simulator aligned with the official certification.

name: P3O ® Foundation.
description: P3O stands for Portfolio, Programme and Projects Offices. P3O is universally applicable guidance by Axelos; to help organizations build support structures that enable the successful delivery of their portfolios of change programmes and projects.

options.description: Voucher for the P3O ® Foundation certification exam, granting access to the official examination.
P3O®Foundation certification exam simulator helps students prepare for the P3O®Foundation, based on the actual exam pattern..

Tailored P3O® Foundation corporate training program designed to establish effective Portfolio, Programme, and Projects Offices within your organization. Includes practical workshops and a comprehensive exam simulator aligned with the official certification.
